attributes.action: authorise a new public inquiry into the Hillsborough disaster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Saturday 15th April 1989, 96 Liverpool fans were tragically killed on the Leppings Lane terrace at Hillsborough stadium.

The verdict from the inquest that followed declared that no one was accountable for the disaster.

Thousands of campaigners the world over, as well as the victims families will not rest until the real culprits are revealed in a fresh public inquiry into the disaster and taken to task.
